page.title: 11 Growing Up In Blackheath
page.content: Michael has lived in Blackheath all his life.He is 23 years old and lives in a 2 bedroomed flat with his parents. There were no state nursery schools in the area and so his first experience of school was the reception class at John Ball school at the age of 5.He remem- bers that it was a happy place where he made many friends.He was taught Maths, English,craft & sport.He went to Thomas Tallis Comprehensive School in Kidbroo- ke and chose to study Chemistry,Geogra- phy,Home Economics,Technical Drawing. Michael left school at 16 and has worked in the village fish shop. Michael says that there is very little for young people to do after work except drink in the village public houses.
